userPage.title: My Submissions
userPage.description: Stations and cells you have submitted for verification

detail.title: Submission Review
detail.readOnly: This submission is read-only. It cannot be edited
detail.reviewNotesPlaceholder: Add a note for the submitter (optional)...
detail.staleWarning: This submission was modified since you opened it. Please review the updated version before proceeding.

rejectApproveCard.confirmReject: Are you sure you want to reject this submission?
rejectApproveCard.confirmRejectDesc: This action is irreversible. The station submitted in this submission will not be added to the database
rejectApproveCard.confirmApprove: Are you sure you want to approve this submission?
rejectApproveCard.confirmApproveDesc: This action is irreversible. The station submitted in this submission will be added to the database, and the submission will be marked as approved

deletionBanner: This submission concerns the deletion of {{stationId}}. Upon approval of this request, the station will be assigned the 'inactive' status

submissionSelector.title: Select Station
submissionSelector.newStationHint: Fill in station and location details below

ratSelector.title: Radio Technologies
ratSelector.description: Select radio technologies (RAT) available at this station
ratSelector.noSelection: Select at least one technology to add cells.
ratSelector.iotHint: IoT cells can be marked in LTE and NR tables as NB-IoT and RedCap respectively

deleteStation.title: Delete Station
deleteStation.warning: The station will be marked for deletion. A moderator will verify your submission
deleteStation.reasonPlaceholder: Why should this station be deleted?

validation.stationIdTooShort: Station ID must be at least 2 characters

table.emptyHintUser: You haven't submitted any stations yet. Start by creating a new submission

stationComments.title: Comments
stationComments.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this comment?

mySubmissions.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this submission?
mySubmissions.confirmDeleteDesc: This action cannot be undone. The submission will be permanently removed.
